S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5333 Intermittent assert failure in testInterruptShutdown: thread's interrupted flag lost after shutdown
Patch derby-5333a fixes two instances where we neglected to note that an interrupt had occured while in a wait call. They were missed during the first code inspection because they appeared to be part of daemon code from a superficial inspection, but the code was in fact called by session threads (for which we expect interrupts).
